item.description:
Acoustic Sunset
Pineappleâ€™s on the Bay
(on Goat Island behind the Hyatt)
Newport RI
Sunday 6/28 5:30PM

Original, classic, and current acoustic rock, great food, and fabulous sunset at this outdoor Tiki Bar venue. Light Fare - Casual Dress.

Free Champagne Toast & Cannon goes off at Sunset.

Weather Permitting - Please watch site - I will notify if event is cancelled due to inclement weather.

Let's hope it will be a nice Summer night!

Parking: Free for Pineapple' on The Bay - if you happen to get a ticket from the garage bring to the Pineapple's bar and it will be validated for free parking!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at bar or table - 401-829-8516 - Lonnie
item.name: Acoustic Sunset at Pineapple's on the Bay
